Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to funds allocated to the independent authorities budget office
Summary: Provides that funds recovered from public authorities for the provision of governmental services and allocated to the independent authorities budget office shall only be used for direct expenses of the authorities budget office and may not be used for fringe benefits and indirect costs.
LawCode: Amd ยง2975, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to funds allocated to the independent authorities budget office
